name: Harpenden Breastfeeding Support
body:
# providing breastfeeding support to mothers in and around Harpenden

**We run every Monday _except_ bank holidays at**

**Skew Bridge Inn**

**59 Southdown Road**

**Harpenden**

**Hertfordshire**

**AL5 1PQ**  

This group is run by volunteer breastfeeding peer supporters. 
An NCT Breastfeeding Counsellor is available during term time.

###  **Contact**

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Harpenden-Breastfeeding-Support/261155513950640?fref=ts)

Email<peersupport@harpenden-nct.org>
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
